pageContext.claim: “Every night, you'd see a story about the vets and how badly they're being treated, and it's a horror show. You don't hear that anymore.”
pageContext.analysis: There continue to be reports of veterans being abused and facing long wait times for treatment. For instance, just before Trump made this comment, there were news stories about 11 suspicious deaths at a VA Medical Center, a VA pathologist who misdiagnosed 3,000 cases and wasn't fired until 2018, a VA physician who allegedly sexually assaulted more than a dozen patients, and how a veteranat a VA facility was allegedly bitten by ants 100 times before his death.
